001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
010import java.util.List;
011import org.openqa.selenium.By;
012
013/**
014 * Provides service-level operations for interacting with checkbox components.
015 *
016 * <p>This class handles selection, deselection, verification of states (selected/enabled),
017 * and retrieval of checkbox values, delegating the interactions to appropriate
018 * {@link Checkbox} implementations based on the given {@link CheckboxComponentType}.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022public class CheckboxServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<CheckboxComponentType, Checkbox>
023      implements CheckboxService {
024
025
026   private static final String SELECT_WITH_TEXT = "Selecting checkbox %s with text %s";
027   private static final String SELECT_USING_STRATEGY = "Selecting checkbox %s using strategy %s";
028   private static final String SELECT_BY_LOCATOR = "Selecting checkbox %s by locator";
029
030   private static final String DESELECT_WITH_TEXT = "Deselecting checkbox %s with text %s";
031   private static final String DESELECT_USING_STRATEGY = "Deselecting checkbox %s using strategy %s";
032   private static final String DESELECT_BY_LOCATOR = "Deselecting checkbox %s by locator";
033
034   private static final String CHECKBOXES_SELECTED = "Checking if checkboxes %s are selected";
035   private static final String CHECKBOXES_SELECTED_BY_LOCATOR = "Checking if checkboxes %s are selected by locator";
036   private static final String CHECKBOX_SELECTED = "Checking if checkbox %s is selected";
037   private static final String CHECKBOX_SELECTED_BY_LOCATOR = "Checking if checkbox %s is selected by locator";
038
039   private static final String CHECKBOXES_ENABLED = "Checking if checkboxes %s are enabled";
040   private static final String CHECKBOXES_ENABLED_BY_LOCATOR = "Checking if checkboxes %s are enabled by locator";
041   private static final String CHECKBOX_ENABLED = "Checking if checkbox %s is enabled";
042   private static final String CHECKBOX_ENABLED_BY_LOCATOR = "Checking if checkbox %s is enabled by locator";
043
044   private static final String GET_SELECTED_CHECKBOXES = "Getting selected checkboxes %s";
045   private static final String GET_SELECTED_CHECKBOXES_BY_LOCATOR = "Getting selected checkboxes %s by locator";
046   private static final String GET_ALL_CHECKBOXES = "Getting all checkboxes %s";
047   private static final String GET_ALL_CHECKBOXES_BY_LOCATOR = "Getting all checkboxes %s by locator";
048
049   private static final String INSERT_VALUE_INTO_CHECKBOX = "Inserting value into checkbox %s";
050
051   /**
052    * Constructs a new CheckboxServiceImpl using the specified SmartWebDriver.
053    *
054    * @param driver the SmartWebDriver used for UI interactions.
055    */
056   public CheckboxServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
057      super(driver);
058   }
059
060   /**
061    * Creates a new Checkbox instance for the given component type.
062    *
063    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
064    * @return a new or cached Checkbox instance.
065    */
066   @Override
067   protected Checkbox createComponent(CheckboxComponentType componentType) {
068      return ComponentFactory.getCheckBoxComponent(componentType, driver);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Selects checkboxes inside a container based on their text.
073    *
074    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
075    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
076    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to select.
077    */
078   @Override
079   public void select(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
080                      final String... checkBoxText) {
081      String text = checkBoxText != null ? String.join(", ", checkBoxText) : "no text added";
082      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_WITH_TEXT, componentType, text));
083      checkboxComponent(componentType).select(container, checkBoxText);
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Selects a checkbox inside a container based on a strategy.
088    *
089    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
090    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
091    * @param strategy      the selection strategy.
092    * @return the selected checkbox text.
093    */
094   @Override
095   public String select(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
096                        final Strategy strategy) {
097      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_USING_STRATEGY, componentType, strategy));
098      return checkboxComponent(componentType).select(container, strategy);
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Selects checkboxes based on their text.
103    *
104    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
105    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to select.
106    */
107   @Override
108   public void select(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String... checkBoxText) {
109      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_WITH_TEXT, componentType, String.join(", ", checkBoxText)));
110      checkboxComponent(componentType).select(checkBoxText);
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Selects checkboxes identified by their locators.
115    *
116    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
117    * @param checkBoxLocator the locators of the checkboxes to select.
118    */
119   @Override
120   public void select(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By... checkBoxLocator) {
121      LogUi.step(String.format(SELECT_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
122      checkboxComponent(componentType).select(checkBoxLocator);
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Deselects checkboxes inside a container based on their text.
127    *
128    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
129    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
130    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to deselect.
131    */
132   @Override
133   public void deSelect(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
134                        final String... checkBoxText) {
135      LogUi.step(String.format(DESELECT_WITH_TEXT, componentType, String.join(", ", checkBoxText)));
136      checkboxComponent(componentType).deSelect(container, checkBoxText);
137   }
138
139   /**
140    * Deselects a checkbox inside a container based on a strategy.
141    *
142    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
143    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
144    * @param strategy      the deselection strategy.
145    * @return the deselected checkbox text.
146    */
147   @Override
148   public String deSelect(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
149                          final Strategy strategy) {
150      LogUi.step(String.format(DESELECT_USING_STRATEGY, componentType, strategy));
151      return checkboxComponent(componentType).deSelect(container, strategy);
152   }
153
154   /**
155    * Deselects checkboxes based on their text.
156    *
157    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
158    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to deselect.
159    */
160   @Override
161   public void deSelect(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String... checkBoxText) {
162      LogUi.step(String.format(DESELECT_WITH_TEXT, componentType, String.join(", ", checkBoxText)));
163      checkboxComponent(componentType).deSelect(checkBoxText);
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Deselects checkboxes identified by their locators.
168    *
169    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
170    * @param checkBoxLocator the locators of the checkboxes to deselect.
171    */
172   @Override
173   public void deSelect(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By... checkBoxLocator) {
174      LogUi.step(String.format(DESELECT_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
175      checkboxComponent(componentType).deSelect(checkBoxLocator);
176   }
177
178   /**
179    * Checks if the specified checkboxes inside a container are selected.
180    *
181    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
182    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
183    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to verify.
184    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected; false otherwise.
185    */
186   @Override
187   public boolean areSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
188                              final String... checkBoxText) {
189      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_SELECTED, componentType));
190      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(container, checkBoxText);
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are selected.
195    *
196    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
197    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to verify.
198    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
199    */
200   @Override
201   public boolean areSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String... checkBoxText) {
202      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_SELECTED, componentType));
203      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(checkBoxText);
204   }
205
206   /**
207    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are selected.
208    *
209    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
210    * @param checkBoxLocator the locators of the checkboxes to verify.
211    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected, false otherwise.
212    */
213   @Override
214   public boolean areSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By... checkBoxLocator) {
215      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_SELECTED_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
216      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(checkBoxLocator);
217   }
218
219   /**
220    * Checks if a checkbox inside a container is selected.
221    *
222    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
223    * @param container     the container holding the checkbox.
224    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkbox to verify.
225    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
226    */
227   @Override
228   public boolean isSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
229                             final String checkBoxText) {
230      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_SELECTED, componentType));
231      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(container, checkBoxText);
232   }
233
234   /**
235    * Checks if a checkbox with the specified text is selected.
236    *
237    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
238    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkbox to verify.
239    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
240    */
241   @Override
242   public boolean isSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String checkBoxText) {
243      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_SELECTED, componentType));
244      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(checkBoxText);
245   }
246
247   /**
248    * Checks if a checkbox identified by a locator is selected.
249    *
250    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
251    * @param checkBoxLocator the locator of the checkbox to verify.
252    * @return true if the checkbox is selected, false otherwise.
253    */
254   @Override
255   public boolean isSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By checkBoxLocator) {
256      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_SELECTED_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
257      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areSelected(checkBoxLocator);
258   }
259
260   /**
261    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text inside a container are enabled.
262    *
263    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
264    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
265    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to verify.
266    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
267    */
268   @Override
269   public boolean areEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
270                             final String... checkBoxText) {
271      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_ENABLED, componentType));
272      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(container, checkBoxText);
273   }
274
275   /**
276    * Checks if the checkboxes with the specified text are enabled.
277    *
278    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
279    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkboxes to verify.
280    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
281    */
282   @Override
283   public boolean areEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String... checkBoxText) {
284      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_ENABLED, componentType));
285      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(checkBoxText);
286   }
287
288   /**
289    * Checks if the checkboxes identified by their locators are enabled.
290    *
291    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
292    * @param checkBoxLocator the locators of the checkboxes to verify.
293    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled, false otherwise.
294    */
295   @Override
296   public boolean areEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By... checkBoxLocator) {
297      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOXES_ENABLED_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
298      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(checkBoxLocator);
299   }
300
301   /**
302    * Checks if a checkbox inside a container is enabled.
303    *
304    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
305    * @param container     the container holding the checkbox.
306    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkbox to verify.
307    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
308    */
309   @Override
310   public boolean isEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
311                            final String checkBoxText) {
312      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_ENABLED, componentType));
313      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(container, checkBoxText);
314   }
315
316   /**
317    * Checks if a checkbox with the specified text is enabled.
318    *
319    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
320    * @param checkBoxText  the text of the checkbox to verify.
321    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
322    */
323   @Override
324   public boolean isEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final String checkBoxText) {
325      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_ENABLED, componentType));
326      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(checkBoxText);
327   }
328
329   /**
330    * Checks if a checkbox identified by a locator is enabled.
331    *
332    * @param componentType   the checkbox component type.
333    * @param checkBoxLocator the locator of the checkbox to verify.
334    * @return true if the checkbox is enabled, false otherwise.
335    */
336   @Override
337   public boolean isEnabled(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By checkBoxLocator) {
338      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECKBOX_ENABLED_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
339      return checkboxComponent(componentType).areEnabled(checkBoxLocator);
340   }
341
342   /**
343    * Retrieves a list of all selected checkboxes inside a container.
344    *
345    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
346    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
347    * @return a list of selected checkbox texts.
348    */
349   @Override
350   public List<String> getSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
351      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_SELECTED_CHECKBOXES, componentType));
352      return checkboxComponent(componentType).getSelected(container);
353   }
354
355   /**
356    * Retrieves a list of all selected checkboxes inside a container identified by its locator.
357    *
358    * @param componentType    the checkbox component type.
359    * @param containerLocator the locator of the container holding the checkboxes.
360    * @return a list of selected checkbox texts.
361    */
362   @Override
363   public List<String> getSelected(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
364      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_SELECTED_CHECKBOXES_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
365      return checkboxComponent(componentType).getSelected(containerLocator);
366   }
367
368   /**
369    * Retrieves a list of all checkboxes inside a container.
370    *
371    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
372    * @param container     the container holding the checkboxes.
373    * @return a list of all checkbox texts.
374    */
375   @Override
376   public List<String> getAll(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
377      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_ALL_CHECKBOXES, componentType));
378      return checkboxComponent(componentType).getAll(container);
379   }
380
381   /**
382    * Retrieves a list of all checkboxes inside a container identified by its locator.
383    *
384    * @param componentType    the checkbox component type.
385    * @param containerLocator the locator of the container holding the checkboxes.
386    * @return a list of all checkbox texts.
387    */
388   @Override
389   public List<String> getAll(final CheckboxComponentType componentType, final By containerLocator) {
390      LogUi.step(String.format(GET_ALL_CHECKBOXES_BY_LOCATOR, componentType));
391      return checkboxComponent(componentType).getAll(containerLocator);
392   }
393
394   /**
395    * Performs an insertion action on a checkbox component.
396    *
397    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
398    * @param locator       the locator for the checkbox.
399    * @param values        optional values for the insertion action.
400    */
401   @Override
402   public void insertion(final ComponentType componentType, final By locator, final Object... values) {
403      if (!(componentType instanceof CheckboxComponentType checkboxType)) {
404         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: CheckboxComponentType.");
405      }
406      LogUi.step(String.format(INSERT_VALUE_INTO_CHECKBOX, checkboxType));
407      select(checkboxType, (String) values[0]);
408   }
409
410   /**
411    * Retrieves the Checkbox instance for the given component type.
412    *
413    * @param componentType the checkbox component type.
414    * @return the Checkbox instance.
415    */
416   private Checkbox checkboxComponent(CheckboxComponentType componentType) {
417      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
418   }
419
420}
